title: Classic Beef Bolognese
description: A rich and hearty Italian meat sauce perfect for pasta dishes.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon.
Add onions and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Stir in garlic and tomato paste, cook for 1 minute.
Pour in red wine and simmer until reduced by half.
Add crushed tomatoes, bay leaves, salt, and pepper.
Reduce heat to low and simmer for 2-3 hours, stirring occasionally.
Stir in milk during the last 30 minutes of cooking.
Remove bay leaves and adjust seasoning.
Serve over pasta with fresh basil and Parmesan cheese.

title: Herb-Roasted Chicken
description: Juicy roasted chicken with aromatic herbs and crispy skin.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Mix butter with rosemary, thyme, and garlic.
Pat chicken dry and rub herb butter under and over the skin.
Season generously with salt and pepper.
Place lemon halves inside the cavity.
Tie legs together with kitchen twine.
Place chicken in a roasting pan and pour broth around it.
Roast for 1 hour 15 minutes, basting every 20 minutes.
Check internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
Let rest for 15 minutes before carving.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Classic homemade cookies with a perfect chewy texture.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.
Beat butter and both sugars until creamy.
Add eggs and vanilla, beat until combined.
Gradually stir in flour mixture.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto baking sheets.
Bake 9-11 minutes until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes.
Transfer to wire rack to cool completely.
